Reviews.Title: I like it. I love it. I am happy I bought it!
Reviews.Author: Holly Hood
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of research on computers and tablets the other day and I knew one thing. I wanted a computer that was also a tablet. I am an author and I do a lot of writing and I wanted something easy to transport anywhere I wanted. Most tablets do not run windows and the few that do are not that lovely in my opinion. I almost bought a surface, but thankfully I went to Best Buy and saw one in person first. It was too small and flimsy for my liking.I never even saw this one on here when I was looking, when we went to Best Buy and saw this I was sold. It is the same size as most laptops. It has a really large screen and best part it has an amazing keyboard. Not those flat thin ones, it is perfect for someone like me who needs a good one for typing.I love just about everything about it. Especially the touch feature. I love how I can just detach the keyboard and go wherever I want. It has everything I could possibly need and want.The only thing I think I would say I wish was better would be the sound. The speakers are not that loud. But it's not that big of a deal. But if you are looking for a great sound system this is not it. I haven't really fiddled with the settings too much but as far as I know the sound is not that loud.I think it is a great buy and I love it.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "totribet"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this yesterday and am still getting to know it.  But so far I am very pleased with it overall.  It seems to perform great.  Easily accessible.  I like the flexibility of being able to use it as a tablet or a laptop.  It reattaches to the keyboard easily and I haven't really had any problems navigating around it.  I'm really enjoying it and I feel that it was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: David Rogacki
Reviews.Content: Best deal for a tablet /laptop combo computer I could find as far as memory and price combo. Great to take on vacation

Reviews.Title: Pretty Decent.
Reviews.Author: rocky
Reviews.Content: I picked one up from bestbuy yesterday to play around with. I must say that the windows 8 is neat but is complicated without a start menu, and plainly no start menu is just stupid for a windows operating system. The keyboard on this Toshiba laptop is pretty stiff, you really have to push down to get the keys to work which I've never experienced on other laptops. While this laptop/tablet is a powerhouse, I recommend looking into a laptop with at least 8 gigs of ram instead of 4.

Reviews.Title: No Auto-rotate
Reviews.Author: David Crawford
Reviews.Content: I purchased this device for its price and specs. It is powerful for $500. However, it performs misserably. It freezes or opens wrong apps on a regular basis. And most importantly, there is no auto rotate function for the screen. This is a bery basic function that even the cheapest Andtoid tablets have. The video driver for tjis tablet does not have the auto rotate function, and there are no updated frivers with the function. A horrible oversite by the designers of this device. I am returning it ASAP.
